description: A Flutter application's main entry point defining the app structure with a basic UI that displays a message and a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget serving as the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the main UI with a centered message and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MaterialApp and the main page UI layout.
